item.title: Reaper
item.description: Reaper Write-Up Scenario Overview For this Hack the Box challenge, we are given the Sherlock Scenario: Our SIEM alerted us to a suspicious logon event that needs to be looked at immediately. The alert details were that the IP Address and the Source Workstation name were a mismatch. You are provided with a network capture and event logs from the time surrounding the incident. Correlate the given evidence and report back to your SOC Manager.
